text: vajra#mEqva BrAtRu#vyEByaqH pra ha#ranti ShODaSiqma#d-daSaqmamaha#-rBavatiq vajra# Eqva vIqrya#M dadhatiq dvAda#Sa saptadaqSA Ba#vantyaqnnAdyaqsyA va#ruddhyAq athOq praiva tairjA#yantEq pRuShThya#H ShaDaqhO Ba#vatiq ShaDvA RuqtavaqH ShaT pRuqShThAni# pRuqShThairEqvartUnaqnvArO#hantyRuqtRuBi#H saM~MvathsaqraM tE sa#M~Mvathsaqra Eqva prati# tiShThantiq dvAda#Saikaviq(gm)qSA Ba#vantiq prati#ShThityAq athOq ruca#mEqvA&&*tman- [  ] 26
